picked_headlines.summary: Efficient mobile-side MLLMs with innovative architectures for high performance on edge devices.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article presents a significant advancement in mobile technology, making it highly relevant for both technical audiences and stakeholders interested in product development and engineering.

picked_headlines.summary: Engineering leaders are increasing AI budgets for 2026, focusing on ROI and multi-vendor strategies.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: The article provides insights into strategic planning and budget allocation for AI tools, crucial for management and engineering leadership.

digest:
- *Chinese ModernBERT* introduces whole-word masking for better Chinese NLP tasks. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.12285)
- *PromptFlow* automates prompt engineering for LLMs, enhancing performance. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.12246)
- *Zero-Shot LLM Agents* improve automated radiotherapy planning. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.11754)
- *SMEC* offers a new framework for compressing retrieval embeddings. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.12474)
- *KaLM-Embedding-V2* achieves state-of-the-art performance with compact models. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.20923)
- *Knowledge Fusion* enhances real-time knowledge integration in LLMs. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.08704)
- *AwareCompiler* optimizes compiler performance with a knowledge-data framework. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.11759)
- *Laminar* improves RL post-training with asynchronous updates. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.12633)
- *Optimally Deep Networks* adapt model depth for better efficiency. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.10764)
- *DeepMMSearch-R1* enhances multimodal web search capabilities. [Read more](https://huggingface.co/papers/2510.12801)
- *ACCO* reduces communication overhead in LLM training. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2406.02613)
- *DeepFund* benchmarks LLMs in fund management. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2505.11065)
- *IVT-LR* improves multimodal reasoning in latent space. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.12603)
- *G-Guard* defends against jailbreak attacks on LLMs. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.07146)
- *Tensor Logic* proposes a new language for AI scalability. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.12269)
- *PubSub-VFL* enhances split learning with a new architecture. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.12494)
- *FlashVSR* achieves real-time video super-resolution. [Read more](https://huggingface.co/papers/2510.12747)

- *ChunkKV* improves long-context LLM inference efficiency. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2502.00299)
